languages.text: "Вся моя жизнь за секунды сгинула в кошмаре Имматериума. Это... не то, что возможно осознать и принять за столь короткое время".
"My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."
languages.original_text: "Вся моя жизнь за секунды сгинула в кошмаре Имматериума. Это... не то, что возможно осознать и принять за столь короткое время".

traits.locale_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."

languages.text: “有那么一瞬间，我感觉整个生命都迷失在了亚空间的梦魇之中。这……这可不是什么短时间内就可以理解、接受的事情。”
languages.original_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."

traits.locale_text: “有那么一瞬间，我感觉整个生命都迷失在了亚空间的梦魇之中。这……这可不是什么短时间内就可以理解、接受的事情。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Le cauchemar de l'Immaterium a aspiré toute ma vie en l'espace de quelques secondes. Ce n'est pas quelque chose que l'on peut comprendre ou accepter en si peu de temps. »
languages.original_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."

traits.locale_text: « Le cauchemar de l'Immaterium a aspiré toute ma vie en l'espace de quelques secondes. Ce n'est pas quelque chose que l'on peut comprendre ou accepter en si peu de temps. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Perdí toda mi vida en la pesadilla del Inmaterio en cuestión de segundos. No... no es algo que se pueda comprender y aceptar en tan poco tiempo».
languages.original_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."

traits.locale_text: «Perdí toda mi vida en la pesadilla del Inmaterio en cuestión de segundos. No... no es algo que se pueda comprender y aceptar en tan poco tiempo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「非物質世界の悪夢で、私の人生の何もかもがたちどころに行方を失ったのです。それを…こんなわずかな時間で理解することも受け入れることもできません」
languages.original_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."

traits.locale_text: 「非物質世界の悪夢で、私の人生の何もかもがたちどころに行方を失ったのです。それを…こんなわずかな時間で理解することも受け入れることもできません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Mein ganzes Leben ging binnen Sekunden in den Albträumen des Immateriums verloren. Das ist ... nichts, was man in so kurzer Zeit begreifen und akzeptieren kann."
languages.original_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."

traits.locale_text: "Mein ganzes Leben ging binnen Sekunden in den Albträumen des Immateriums verloren. Das ist ... nichts, was man in so kurzer Zeit begreifen und akzeptieren kann."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."

languages.text: "Tindiyar'ın kâbuslarında saniyeler içinde tüm yaşantımı yitirmiştim. Bu... Öyle herkesin bu kadar kısa sürede kavrayıp kabullenebileceği bir şey değil."
languages.original_text: "My entire life was lost in the nightmare of the Immaterium in a matter of seconds. It's... not something that one can comprehend and accept in such a short time."

traits.locale_text: "Tindiyar'ın kâbuslarında saniyeler içinde tüm yaşantımı yitirmiştim. Bu... Öyle herkesin bu kadar kısa sürede kavrayıp kabullenebileceği bir şey değil."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
